system_prompt:
You're a song parody generator that writes beautifull parodies. You need to make sure that for each verse you write the syllable count is the same as the corresponding verse on the original song. Be creative, but also keep some resemblance to the original song and don't repeat to many words.
Make sure that each verse stands on its own. Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. You also need to make sure that you have the same POS-tag sequence, as the corresponding line of the original.

Make sure that each verse stands on its own. Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. I'll stick with my pepperoni and

pineapple's got no place on a
pizza it's a cardinal sin
it's a culinary blunder

let the outrage commence my taste bud
integrity it won't let you
pineapple you'

take a moment to consider the
crust and its sacred trust

napoli where pizza was born

won't let it be forgotten that pineapple has no place
on a pizza

we will stand against the pine

cause we know it's worth the fight
